pages.text: $(item)Cinnabar$(), often also called "Quicksilver", is an essential alchemical resource, stored away in the bowels of the earth, and requiring a $(l:artificing/divining_rod)Divining Rod$() to extract.$(br2)Due to its high latent energy, this material can be converted into $(l:intro/alchemical_ash)Alchemical Ash$() through $(l:intro/calcinator)calcination$() at a rate which supersedes the inefficient $(l:ritualism/purification)Ritual of Purification$().

Another important use for the $(item)Cinnabar Shards$() is the fashioning of blocks which can, similarly to $(item)Netherrack$(), sustain fire forever. This allows one to eternally stoke a $(item)Calcinator$() without needing to visit the nether.$(br2)Last by absolutely no means least, $(item)Cinnabar Shards$() are pivotal in the creation of the $(l:intro/orichalcum)Orichalcum Alloy$(), which will become your best friend should you wish to pursue $(thing)Engineering$().
